column1: Little Goat Diner////I've been to Little Goat for breakfast
column2: lunch and dinner. I must say
column3: everything I've ever had was DELICIOUS!!! Today
column4: I enjoyed the french toast with fried chicken
column5: UM YUM! and my family had the fish tostadas
column6: smoked corned beef hash and the breakfast spaghetti. The service was on point and the food came out quickly
column7: considering they were really busy. They do NOT take reservations
column9: unless you come during off peak times. The host staff was extremely friendly and kept me posted on my wait time
column10: which I really appreciated. Usually hosts can be very obnoxious
column11: but the ones here rock! I will definitely be back and would highly recommend to anyone looking for great food in a cool atmosphere. ENJOY!
